page-not-found.title: Page Not Found
page-not-found.message: The page you requested could not be found.

domain.invalid: This email must not be from one of the following domains: {domains}
domain.valid: This email must be from one of the following domains: {domains}

email.invalid: This field must be a valid email address

exclusion.in: This field is not a valid value. Value cannot be: {in}

file.acceptedTypes: Only files of the following types are accepted: {types}
file.unacceptedTypes: Files of the following types are not accepted: {types}

inclusion.in: This field is not a valid value. Valid values are: {in}

array.between: This field must have between {min} and {max} values (has {length})
array.tooLong: This field must have at most {max} values (has {length})
array.tooShort: This field must have at least {min} values (has {length})

string.between: This field must be between {min} and {max} characters (has {length})
string.tooLong: This field must be at most {max} characters (has {length})
string.tooShort: This field must be at least {min} characters (has {length})

number.notANumber: This field must be a number
number.integer: This field must be an integer
number.positive: This field must be a positive number
number.negative: This field must be a negative number
number.even: This field must be an even number
number.odd: This field must be an odd number
number.precision: This field must have at most {precision} decimal places
number.multipleOf: This field must be a multiple of {multipleOf, number}

password.strength: Password does not meet the minimum strength requirements

areaCode.invalid: This phone number must not include one of the following area codes: {areaCodes}
areaCode.notAllowed: This phone number must not include an area code
areaCode.required: This phone number must include an area code
areaCode.valid: This phone number must include a valid area code: {areaCodes}

countryCode.invalid: This phone number must not include one of the following country codes: {countryCodes}
countryCode.notAllowed: This phone number must not include a country code
countryCode.required: This phone number must include a country code
countryCode.valid: This phone number must include a valid country code: {countryCodes}

exchangeCode.invalid: This phone number must not include one of the following exchange codes: {exchangeCodes}
exchangeCode.valid: This phone number must include a valid exchange code: {exchangeCodes}

phone.invalid: This field must be a valid phone number

presence.listBlank: At least one option must be selected

range.greaterThan: This field must be greater than {min, number}
range.greaterThanOrEqualTo: This field must be greater than or equal to {min, number}
range.lessThan: This field must be less than {max, number}
range.lessThanOrEqualTo: This field must be less than or equal to {max, number}
range.notANumber: This field must be a number
